Messages.AlarmCodeAlreadyExist: More than one user alarm with the same code encountered in the configuration. Alarm group: {0}, in group index: {1}
Messages.AlarmTagAlreadyExist: More than one user alarm with the same tag encountered in the configuration. Tag: {0}
Messages.UnknownCode: Attempt to access user alarm by code not described in module configuration.
Messages.AlarmNumberOutOfRange: Attempt to access user alarm by index which is out of range
Messages.UseDictionary: Use dictionary tags for the alarm header and message
Messages.UserAlarmsHandlerNotFound: User alarms handler is not included in the robot build
